titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Drinking Water State Revolving Fund and the Clean Water State Revolving Fund.
A bill to authorize appropriations for the Drinking Water State Revolving Fund and the Clean Water State Revolving Fund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
This bill amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to reauthorize through FY2020 the drinking water state revolving fund program.
The bill also amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act (commonly known as the Clean Water Act) to reauthorize through FY2020 the state revolving fund program for water pollution control.
